snippet: A collection of sports lowlights in Cleveland, which has not celebrated a championship team in 50 years but was cheered on Friday by LeBron James’s decision to play for the Cavaliers.
abstract: LeBron James's decision to return to Cleveland Cavaliers represents a rare bit of good news for Cleveland's sports fans, who have not had a championship team in any sport for 50 years; examples of some of city's most disappointing sporting moments are chronicled.
lead_paragraph: A collection of sports lowlights in Cleveland, which has not celebrated a championship team in 50 years but was cheered on Friday by LeBron James’s decision to play for the Cavaliers.

headline.seo: Cleveland Hopes LeBron James’s Return Ends Title Drought
headline.main: The Blooper Reel: Cleveland Fans Aren’t Used to Such Good News
headline.print_headline: Good News Awfully Rare for City’s Fans
